content: **use my free pattern and knit your own unicorn socks ** the licorne socks are knitted from the toe-up in the round with the heel flap the top of the sock is ornamented with the beautiful lace pattern reminding the unicorn s horn the pattern includes both written and charted instructions **sizes** 1 60 sts 2 64 sts 3 72 sts finished foot circumference unstretched 17 6 18 8 21 1 cm / 7 7 5 8 5 in the socks were designed to be worn with approx 2 5 cm 1 in of negative ease in width **yarn** the socks were designed for a fingering weight yarn i ve used woollala sock merino 75% merino wool 25% nylon 425m 465 yds in 100 g the sample socks were knit with colorful memories for the main color and hot pink for the contrast color in the cuff for a pair of socks you ll need approx mc 220 240 260 m / 240 265 285 yds for the shorties mc 280 300 320 m / 305 330 350 yds for the regular length cc approx 30-40 m / 35-45 yds for both versions note the yardage is estimated and depends on the sock s length **needles & notions** 2 25 mm us #1 circular needles for the magic loop technique or dpns or other size to get the proper gauge 2 mm us #1 circular needles for the magic loop technique or dpns or one size smaller than the main needles stitch markers row counter tapestry needle for sewing and weaving ends **gauge** 34 sts and 48 rounds = 10 cm 4 in in stockinette stitch pattern on 2 25 mm us #1 needles note measure the gauge after washing and blocking the swatch adjust the needle size if necessary to get the proper gauge **skorzystaj w mojego darmowego wzoru i wydziergaj swoje
